replies.body: That thing grants 30+100 AD at 3,000 gold. Imagine a fed Jhin.

The Magic golden spade would literall break the game. Late game- you know that moment when u have like 9000 gold at the end and you cant use it... :/ there you go now you get 600 AD and AP
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Most of them sound a bit broken.

Jhin completely breaks that 1st item. And the 2nd to last item breaks like... Every mage. Gives more AP than 2 Rabadons with passive, at a cheaper price. That + Rab = 658 AP...  Just 2 items and you're practically full build. Add in runes and you have 700 AP easy.
I have an interesting item I might post though...
